text_section1.text: He was the most important courier of all time! And Earth scientists had good cause for alarm -- for this was the

text_section2.text: Ambassador From Venus

text_section3.text: Great grief! The things being supported by puppet strings! W-who is it? What does he want here?

text_section4.text: I have come to warn you, Earth scientist!

text_section1.text: It happened that day the great minds of astronomy gathered to probe the problems of space in Washington...

text_section2.text: At long last we have entered the space age! It is vital that we learn as quickly as possible how to adjust to this new era!

text_section1.text: Suddenly, the meeting was startled as an eerie buzzing vibrated chamber...

text_section2.text: W-what's that? What's happened?

text_section3.text: Great Scott! Rays -- vibrating from above striking the steps!

text_section1.text: And outside, stunned citizens saw a most astonishing sight...

text_section2.text: Look! Something materializing in thin air!

text_section1.text: Then...

text_section2.text: There is no need to be alarmed, gentlemen! I have come to attend your conference and speak before you!

text_section1.text: Inside, the bizarre figure strode to the speaker's stand...

text_section2.text: Time is short! I must be brief! I come from out in space! Please heed my words well!

text_section1.text: The hand of the life-like puppet reached ominously into the case and...

text_section2.text: You here on Earth will soon be joining our great galaxy of planets! My mission is to brief you on your coming journey!

text_section1.text: The glowing disk vibrated with some unseen force...
And abruptly an incredible picture filled the vast chamber...

text_section2.text: Observe the planet -- Urgeo!

text_section1.text: Slowly, the ominous scene faded... and with mechanical movements the puppet withdrew a second disk.

text_section2.text: Who are you? What does this all mean?

text_section3.text: My next mind disk is that of the planet Tarto!

text_section1.text: Again, a third dimensional life-like picture of scenes 1,000,000 light years away took form...

text_section2.text: Tarto hurtles through space even now -- a flaming, atomized, vanquished planet!

text_section3.speaker_referent: X1 or X2 or X3 or X5 or X6 or X7

text_section1.text: Fear... anger stirred the great scientific minds as...

text_section2.text: There! It has happened -- Tarto has become a dead, exploding star!

text_section3.speaker_referent: X1 or X2 or X3 or X5 or X6 or X7
text_section3.text: They've sent a puppet from space to frighten us! But why?

text_section1.text: And as the vision dimmed...

text_section2.text: Stop this! We're men of science also! Stop treating us like children! What is the purpose of all this?

text_section3.text: Wait, men of science! You must see the next disk -- it is the most important of all!

text_section1.text: Then, as the next space picture took form...

text_section2.text: It's the Earth!

text_section3.text: They've got those fantastic `mind' pictures of our own planet!

text_section1.text: Instantly, the sound of explosions rent the room...

text_section2.text: The Earth bombarded by H bombs! We're being threatened!

text_section3.text: This is their way of telling us how they can destroy us!

text_section1.text: It is for your own good that I come! You must learn the best way to exist!

text_section2.text: Great grief! They must want to control us in some fashion!

text_section1.text: And as the puppet moved outside...

text_section2.text: You of the Earth must be awakened to the great like that awaits you -- when men of Venus come to control your destinies --

text_section1.text: See how I am controlled by the all-powerful will? I need not think or worry! I need only obey orders and enjoy life!

text_section2.text: So that's it! The power that controls that thing seeks to run Earth people as puppets also!

text_section1.text: Suddenly...

text_section2.text: The power emitting from that mobile TV unit -- it's disturbing one of his puppet strings! He's rising on that side! Of course! I think I know their secret!

text_section1.text: Hurry! Phone the city lighting company! Tell the officials I want them to do exactly as I say! Now, listen...
Soon after, as the excited scientist races after the bizarre, dangling figure.

text_section2.text: Puppet from outer space, I am not convinced your is the best life! Let me see if you can move about everywhere as easily as I can!

text_section3.text: Lead and I shall follow you anywhere!

text_section1.text: No matter how fast you travel, a Venusian can travel faster!
Further and further the scientist leads the dangling figure...

text_section2.text: See -- I can walk across water on my strings! You are a fool not to want to become a puppet also!

text_section3.text: It must work -- It's got to!

text_section1.text: Now! Turn on full power!
Suddenly generators hum -- tremendous voltage surges through the company apparatus and...

text_section2.text: The puppet strings -- they've melted, broken!

text_section3.text: Those aren't puppet strings! And he's not a puppet!

text_section1.text: As I suspected when that TV power unit weakened one of his supports -- those are gravitational rays!

text_section2.text: Help me! Help me! I-I'm too heavy to move on your planet!

text_section1.text: Because gravity on his planet is lighter than ours. He can't walk without those power beams that moved with him! It was a bluff -- a gigantic bluff from space to control us!

text_section2.text: Please... release the power so that I can return to Venus! I won't bother you again!

text_section1.text: And shortly, as the power is turned off...

text_section2.text: A war lord of Venus seeking to fool us as a puppet! How could they think we would believe such a thing?

text_section3.text: One thing is certain -- they won't be back!
